languages.text: {n}В груди разлилось тепло. Мне нравится думать, что это — связь, которой Неумирающий связал мою судьбу с судьбой Домин. Он благословил нас, и мы охотимся. Вместе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Странно. Отчего в груди вдруг разлилось тепло? Быть можеть, это нить Туэ'ри, натянутая между мной и Эним? Да... Я чувствую {mf|его|ее} незримое присутствие. Неумирающи благословил нас, и мы охотимся. Вместе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В груди разлилось тепло. Мне нравится думать, что это — связь, которой Неумирающий связал мою судьбу с судьбой Домин. Он благословил нас, и мы охотимся. Вместе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}A warmth spreads through my chest. Maybe it is the thread of Tue'ri that stretches between me and Enim. The Undying One has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}A warmth spreads through my chest. Maybe it is the thread of Tue'ri that stretches between me and Enim. The Undying One has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}A warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}
{n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wärme breitet sich in meiner Brust aus. Ich stelle mir gerne vor, sie ist die Verbindung, über die der Todlose mein Schicksal mit dem {mf|des|der} Domin verbunden hat. Er hat uns gesegnet, und wir jagen als Einheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wärme breitet sich in meiner Brust aus. Ich stelle mir gerne vor, sie ist die Verbindung, über die der Todlose mein Schicksal mit dem {mf|des|der} Domin verbunden hat. Er hat uns gesegnet, und wir jagen als Einheit.{/n}
{n}Eine Wärme breitet sich in meiner Brust aus. Es könnte der Faden von Thue'ri sein, der zwischen mir und {mf|dem|der} Enim gespannt ist. Der Todlose hat uns gesegnet, und wir jagen als Einheit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una calidez se extiende por mi pecho. Me gusta pensar que es la conexión con la que el Inmortal ha unido mi destino con el de{mf|l| la} Domin. Nos ha bendecido, y ahora cazamos como un{mf|o|a}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una calidez se extiende por mi pecho. Me gusta pensar que es la conexión con la que el Inmortal ha unido mi destino con el de{mf|l| la} Domin. Nos ha bendecido, y ahora cazamos como un{mf|o|a}.{/n}
{n}Una calidez se extiende por mi pecho. Puede ser el hilo del Thue'ri que se extiende entre {mf|el|la} Enim y yo. El Inmortal nos ha bendecido, y ahora cazamos como un{mf|o|a}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}胸にぬくもりが広がる。それこそが、不死の者が我とドミンの運命を結び付けた縁なのだと思いたい。不死の者が我らを祝福し、我らは一つになって狩りをする。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}胸にぬくもりが広がる。それこそが、不死の者が我とドミンの運命を結び付けた縁なのだと思いたい。不死の者が我らを祝福し、我らは一つになって狩りをする。{/n}
{n}胸にぬくもりが広がる。それは私とエニムの間に伸びるトゥエリの糸なのかもしれない。不死の者が私たちを祝福し、私たちは一つになって狩りをする。{/n}

languages.text: {n}一股暖流穿过我的胸膛，我认为这源自我与秘者之间连接的纽带。不死之神将我们的命运联结在一起，赐予了我们祝福，让我们合而为一，共同狩猎。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一股暖流穿过我的胸膛，我认为这源自我与秘者之间连接的纽带。不死之神将我们的命运联结在一起，赐予了我们祝福，让我们合而为一，共同狩猎。{/n}
{n}一股暖流穿过我的胸膛，或许这是我与秘者之间圣狩祭礼的丝线。不死之神赐福于我们，让我们二人齐心协力狩猎。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Une étrange chaleur vient emplir ma poitrine. J'aime à penser que c'est le lien par lequel l'Immortel a attaché mon destin à celui {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin. Nous avons reçu Sa bénédiction, et nous sommes {rt_mf|unis|unies} dans la chasse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Warmth spreads through my chest. I like to think that it is the connection with which the Undying One bound my and the Domin's fates together. He has blessed us, and we hunt as one.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Une étrange chaleur vient emplir ma poitrine. J'aime à penser que c'est le lien par lequel l'Immortel a attaché mon destin à celui {rt_mf|du|de la} Domin. Nous avons reçu Sa bénédiction, et nous sommes {rt_mf|unis|unies} dans la chasse.{/n}

{n}Une étrange chaleur vient emplir ma poitrine. Sans doute le fil de Thue'ri qui nous relie, l'Enim et moi. Nous avons reçu la bénédiction de l'Immortel, et nous sommes {mf|unis|unies} dans la chasse.{/n}
